block.title: MCRN Corvette System Backlog Configuration
block.text: You MUST check this box when first installing, so the weekly and monthly visualizations will function properly.
It is set to false initially to prevent the loader from running before the restart which the app requires upon install.
This will be set to false after the backlog is first loaded, so you don't get flooded with events.
Should you wish to reload the backlog data at some point, come back here and check the box again.
The management port of your Splunk instance; used to refresh this configuration after the initial load.
